Title: Tech
Book Description: Sarah Elkins, Noah Sussman, Jer Lance
All Day Event: 'Is tech hiring like Pokemon?  How do you hire *and* hang on to good people?  What do recruiting and retention have to do with each other?  If you're looking for a job- does 'passion' in the job ad sound inspiring- or like 80-hour work weeks are expected?  The panelists have each been on both sides of the interview table.  Come hear their perspectives and share your own.'
